text:
The doctors now in isolation got exposed from another LUTH doctor who is currently Covid19 positive.

These doctors feel hopeless.
NOT paid 6months.
NOTHING to eat.
NOTHING to give family.

Yet LUTH has made it clear they don’t care. If they die, they die.
#LuthPayYour34Doctors

entity.name: Doctor Who
entity.description: Extraterrestre de 900 ans, le Docteur est un aventurier qui voyage à travers le temps et l'espace à l'aide de son vaisseau, le TARDIS. Ils fait de nombreuses rencontres sur les diverses planètes qu'il explore...

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
